message: COMPREHENSIVE CONSOLIDATION DOCUMENTATION COMPLETED: Created complete implementation-ready documentation for dual table pattern consolidation at docs/DUAL_TABLE_CONSOLIDATION_PLAN.md

content_structure.executive_summary: HIGH confidence, LOW risk recommendation to consolidate immediately
content_structure.current_issues: 72% broken pattern, case sensitivity, non-atomic updates
content_structure.technical_details: Complete schema changes, code patterns, dependencies
content_structure.risk_assessment: MINIMAL data loss risk, POSITIVE production impact
content_structure.benefits: 50% performance improvement, single source of truth

key_findings_documented.data_reality: Only 5/18 machines have machine_state data - 72% already broken
key_findings_documented.transaction_issues: Non-atomic dual table updates create race conditions
key_findings_documented.performance_impact: Double database operations for every state change
key_findings_documented.case_sensitivity: idle vs IDLE mismatches affecting 4/5 machines
key_findings_documented.foreign_key_safety: No reverse dependencies make consolidation safe

implementation_readiness.phase_1: 30 min case sensitivity fix - MINIMAL risk

coordination_with_investigations.addresses_root_cause: Eliminates dual table pattern that creates the problems other agents fixed symptoms of
